items.name: Horizon Timepieces
items.description: For the adventurers at heart, Horizon Timepieces are rugged, durable, and made to accompany you to the edge of the world and back, blending style with tenacity.

items.name: Aeon Watches
items.description: Aeon Watches are the quintessence of modern luxury, featuring sleek designs and innovative technology for the forward-thinking individual.
